docs.text: ACE2 GUI Development Guide ¶ Frontend (Vue.js) commands ¶ Compile and minify for production ¶ docker-compose run frontend npm run build Run unit tests ¶ docker-compose run frontend npm run test:unit Run end-to-end tests ¶ docker-compose run frontend npm run test:e2e Lint and fix files ¶ docker-compose run frontend npm run lint Customize configuration ¶ See Configuration Reference .
